meanings.definition: To make known publicly or officially
meanings.sent1: The teacher announces the winner of the spelling bee.
meanings.sent2: The mayor announces new policies for the city.
meanings.sent3: The parrot announces visitors with a loud squawk.
meanings.sent4: The rising sun announces the start of a new day.
meanings.sent5: The thunder announces the arrival of a storm.

meanings.sent1: The captain announces the team's victory over the loudspeaker.
meanings.sent2: The president announces a national holiday.
meanings.sent3: The cat announces its displeasure with a meow.
meanings.sent4: The trumpet announces the arrival of the king.
meanings.sent5: The alarm clock announces the start of a new day.

meanings.definition: To give notice of; to make known
meanings.sent1: The radio announces traffic delays on the highway.
meanings.sent2: The news anchor announces breaking news.
meanings.sent3: The dog announces the mailman's arrival with barks.
meanings.sent4: The lighthouse announces the dangerous rocks to sailors.
meanings.sent5: The phone announces an incoming call with a ring.

meanings.definition: To reveal or make something known to others
meanings.sent1: The magician announces his next trick to the audience.
meanings.sent2: The author announces the release date of the new book.
meanings.sent3: The owl announces its presence with a hoot in the night.
meanings.sent4: The detective announces the identity of the culprit.
meanings.sent5: The clock announces the passing of each hour with a chime.
